1.heading: Canvassing
1.raw:
When you begin with the first line, you begin with the inherent recognition that to be a 45 is to be, by your very nature, beneficial to the tribe. That does not mean that you get to exercise that beneficence.
After all, if you do not have the other side, then you always have to wait for the energy to come.

The first line is called Canvassing which is: The ability to promote and develop gathering together through the education of the uncommitted. Mars in detriment. An over-zealousness that turns canvassing
into proselytization and tends to alienate rather than gather support. This is all about education.

In terms of the white book: The material direction lies in education, or The drive for material that leads to aggressive education.

The whole thing about being the leader of the tribe is that the way in which the tribe benefits is by being educated. The more educated the community, the more successful it becomes. We live in an age in which
we have watched this historically over the last 300 years: the development of public education and the vast improvement in the nature of our lives and the ability for us to have representative democracies in
which the population as a whole is given a responsibility for the direction of the people. This is the byproduct of education. The key to the nature of the 45 is that, if they can bring education to the tribe,
they are always going to be of benefit, which means they themselves have to be educated.

It is very important for 45's to be educated and, of course, this is a joke because all aristocracy has been privileged in having education while the rest of humanity was left behind. It is built into being a 45 that
you must have a solid education because it is only out of that grounding that you can be of benefit to those that are in your community.

Page 1

At the mundane level, at the material level, this is about being successful in business when you can provide something new, something of educational value, something that the other does not know anything
about. For example, the first person that brings the refrigerator into the community that never had one before. When the tribal leader brings the refrigerator and says, "Let me educate you about the benefits of
this refrigerator. " You can be a salesman in a shop or you can be the tribal leader, but what you are trying to bring is of benefit.

This is one of the keys to the 45. If the 45 is not providing something that is of benefit to the community, whatever they make, whatever money they bring into their lives, will poison them. I am being very heavy
because it is accurate. This is the whole nature of possession. The 45 is allowed to possess. This is their nature. They have to possess. At the same time, out of their possession, they must bring benefit to others
and it must be of value to others. If they just make money from the tribe, "Here I have the ABC box and you should all have my picture hanging in your house," that is not a leader benefiting the public because
they have to buy that. They have to invest in that and, ultimately, the money that comes from that will be poisoned because it is not of benefit. The leader must bring things of benefit. The first line knows that its
beneficence is there, but it does not necessarily know how to bring that to the tribe.

2.heading: Consensus
2.raw:
The second line is projection, so you know what these people are projecting out. They project out that they can be the tribal leader and that they can be of benefit to others. The fact that this is a mechanical
gate in the throat, a metamorphic gate, means that there are already built into these people techniques of bringing about this beneficial impact.

The second line is called Consensus. Gathering together is strengthened by acknowledged common interest. Well, it does not work any other way. These people are projecting out that they can be of benefit.
But they can only really be of benefit to those people that they can really be of benefit to. Otherwise, they are paper tigers and it may not turn out to be that way and they are uncomfortable.

Uranus exalted. The inventiveness to establish techniques by which common ground can be assessed. So, there is a quality within these people that they can project out, which is that they can provide a beneficial
technique to others.

In the white book: A material direction through the expression of techniques for the benefit of others.
Please, do not forget this beneficence. It always has to be built into this process. The difficulty with the second line is that, because they are projecting outwards, there are only certain people (this is not a
transpersonal line) that they can really be of benefit for. They feel handicapped by those people for which they are not of benefit.

They end up with the pressure of the other side, which is: An innate rebellion against conformityor, in terms of the white book: The refusal to accept the material techniques of others. That is like being the
king and saying, "This is the way things work." And, instead of having a subject that says, "This is not for me," you have a subject that comes up to you and says to you, "Your technique is wrong." The 45.2 in
detriment does not want to hear anything like that. They are not going to pay attention to somebody else telling them what and how the benefit should be. They are people that try to become the power behind the
throne, and they try to control. These 45.2's can often get controlled from behind by other people.

3.heading: Exclusion
3.raw:
Most difficult in the 45 is the third line. So many third lines are difficult simply because they are involved in this trial and error process. Because the wave is about bonds made and broken, this is extremely

Page 2

difficult for a tribal leader. The bond for a tribal leader is only broken when they die. This is something that is clear for them in the nature of their process. This is not an official that you can un-elect. This is a
tribal leader. You either kill them or you wait until they die, but they are going to be the leader until they die. This is the way we used to live with kings in this world.

This line is called Exclusion. It says: The ability when excluded to take whatever measures are necessary to dissolve the antiquated form and to accept even humiliation to achieve inclusion. These are people who
know that they are the ones that can bring the benefits but they do not always get that recognition.
Because so often in their growing process, they offer a benefit that they can bring, and there is a mistake involved and it does not really work out, due to that, they don't necessarily trust themselves. Nor do the
others who hook into that energy trust them that there really is something that can work. Yet at the same time, because it is in their blood, it is in their genetics to be a leader, they will do anything, including
accepting humiliation, to get close to that center of power, so that they can eventually have their opportunity to be beneficial to others. The instinct to find a way to be included in a material process.

The other side is: The expression of frustration when not included in a material process. This is as it says in the black book: An aggressive and often violent reaction to exclusion. For example: succession in a
family. You have five children and one of them becomes the ruler of the tribe. One of those children realizes within themselves that they are the one that can bring a better benefit to the tribe and that they
will be a better leader, but they have to accept the humiliation of not being the leader and still stay close to the leadership. On the positive side, they make their contribution that way. They will slowly try to
educate the one that is really in power to get the benefits out somehow so that they can participate in that process. But, if they have the detriment, then they hire an assassin and they kill their sibling and they take
over the throne. Or the producer who controls the film instead of the director. The director has to suffer the humiliation of putting up with the producer saying, "You have to do this and that." And slowly, the
director tries to find a way in which he can influence the producer, so that it comes out beneficially the way he wants. Of course, in the extreme, you kill the producer.

4.heading: Direction
4.raw:
When you come to the upper trigram, you come to the fourth line. You come to externalization, to this fixed recognition that, first of all, there is another side. The 45/21 never works properly when it is inside
somebody's chart. If you see somebody who has this whole channel, you know that they will always have difficulties. This is a channel that is designed to be electro-magnetic, in order to be at its most effective.
The awareness in the fourth line is the recognition and the mechanic that there is a force on the other side, the 21, the power of the ego to drive this whole process. The fourth line is called Direction. This is a fixed
externalization of being of benefit. That is what it is all about.

The ability to focus the opportunity of gathering together for the service of higher principles. 'Higher principles' means: is it of benefit? That is all. Don't get caught up in thinking that is has to be spiritual or
mystical. It has to do with the mundane plane and being able to provide for the tribe. When it comes to the tribe, the highest principles are food, shelter and health. That is number one. After that, there are all
these different levels. Higher principles mean that, whatever the source of the material plane is, it has to bring benefit to those who will receive all of that.

On the other side, we have Mars in detriment. The tendency to try to influence the direction of a group action for personal benefit. That is okay. It is the same process. These people make sure that, while they
are being of benefit to everybody else, they are really of benefit to themselves as well. They are not just simply fixed on externalizing their beneficial value to others.

Page 3

In the white book: The expression (or the lack of expression) of higher principles on the material plane. If you get involved in bringing false benefits to the community, this will always backlash against the 45,
even if it is the 21 who does it. It is the 45 that has to take the responsibility for that. So, it is very important for 45 's to recognize that whatever they are involved in on the material plane, they have to see
the direct benefit of their work. If they cannot see the direct benefit of their work, they are in the wrong kind of work because it is going to bring back all kinds of negative energy into their life. The other thing
is, like in all fourth lines, it waits for opportunity.

5.heading: Leadership
5.raw:
You get to the fifth line and you get to universalization. Again, this is the way in which the community, the tribe, will project onto this fifth-line person. It is always projected onto them that they really are the
leader. These are people that naturally can be made leaders in a community because the community will project this quality onto them. Whether you are dealing with the exalted or the detriment in this line, there
is very little difference, other than that the detriment talks about the immature process. It is about what it takes to slowly develop that recognition because it is built in.

This line is called Leadership. All gathering must have a center and a focus. This is about the leader. They are the center, the focus. They are the one. Uranus exalted. The intuitive intellect and gift for innovation
that enhance the group effort and ensure continuity through respect for the center. They are projected on to be the tribal authority and, in the exalted side, they have the capacity to live that out.

The gift for expressing leadership on the material plane. By the way, the way a 45 expresses their leadership is always being able to educate others so that they can benefit, which means that they direct.
They tell people what to do; they don't do the doing themselves. That is why the 21 connected to the 45 in a chart is of no value whatsoever to the 45, because the 45 then says, "I have to do." This is not for them
to do. They have to educate and provide the benefit, but it is for the tribe to work out those benefits, to go through that process.

The Jupiter in detriment. A sense of right action that assumes a respect that may not as yet have been earned. This side is the difficulty for the child. This is the situation where the child itself recognizes its
leadership quality but, of course, leadership is something that you have to establish. You have to be able to show that you can do it. When you are young, you do not have that experience. So, the reality is that
these children seem very arrogant, very aristocratic. They can feel like, "I am a pasha and everything should come to me now," instead of waiting until the time comes that they can really earn that by truly
being of benefit to others. Again, they are the product of the projection field on them.

In the white book: The drive for leadership that may not have yet earned the right. What I say to these people is, "That is okay. You will eventually get the respect. You just keep on working on your process."
That is what it is all about.

6.heading: is the kind of tribal leader that makes the tribe very nervous because it is the only tribal leader that recognizes that, unless we integrate the strangers, the outsiders, into the tribe, the genetic pool of the tribe
6.raw:
is going to die.

Page 4

Imagine what that is like if it is a family business. The head of the family business says, "The only way that this business is really going to grow now is if we stop having it as a family business. We put our
shares on the stock market. We become a real corporation and we will bring in all these outsiders to help us in this process to expand." For members of the tribe, for members of that family, that can be very
frightening because it is no longer a family community business. All of a sudden, outsiders are coming in.

This sixth line, like all sixth lines, knows that it is not enough to be the tribal leader. "I don't want to be just this tribal leader. I don't want to sit in my tipi, in my village, living a primitive life for the rest of my
days. I want a television, a computer..." The reality is that the sixth line recognizes the intrinsic value of the outsider. On one side: Let's just bring the outsiders in. On the other side: Once we have them in, let's
control them so that the rest of the tribe is happy.

So, you have all kinds of rulers in history. (Catherine the Great, who brought all the French philosophers into the court.) They brought the outsiders in to try to bring about a broader mutation in the tribe, so that
the tribe would grow and become healthier, thus bringing a benefit from the outside. New genes, new blood, new ideas and new concepts. All of that is a threat to the tribe because the tribe likes its traditions.
It does not expect its leaders to be heretics, but the reality is that their leader can turn around on them and say, "Yes, but I want to bring in all these foreign people because I think that this will be beneficial to our
society."

We all know what happens afterwards. We have that in our all modern countries where you have all kinds of immigration and then you have the native tribe and you bring in all these other forces, and after a while
you get a backlash in all of that because the tribe gets upset.

A material direction which serves the outsider; or A material direction that is focused on conditioning the outsider to conform.

An outsider who can admit that its prior rejection was an error will generally be accepted into the gathering. To bring the outsiders in is the gift of the sixth line. An innate empathy with the outsider
mentality and its eccentric and often misunderstood logic. This works on many levels, but the real level is that if you don't bring the strangers in, the tribe is going to fail. It is going to die. If you do not bring a
stranger into the business, it is not going to be successful.

Jupiter in detriment. Where Uranus will innovate to find a place for an outsider, Jupiter will demand that it conforms. "Okay, you are a stranger. You have come here and you have fallen in love with my
daughter, and you do not come from the same tribe as me. I don't mind that you are here. You can be my son, but you have to behave like we behave here in this village. Bring your blood, but I am going to
control you and make sure that you look like everybody else in the tribe, so that nobody gets upset and bothers my poor daughter because she has married this freak, this outsider." This is the sixth line saying,
"Okay, you can come in as a stranger, but I will control you."

All of this is about understanding that, rooted in the 45.6, is the opportunity for the tribe to mutate. If the tribe cannot mutate, we will have no changes in this world that are really of value. It is only when the
tribe changes that the world changes. The collective is impersonal. The tribe is there in deep support for each other. Only when we can mutate the tribe are we going to have eventual mutation in the way that we
live with each other and the way we share the resources of the world.

raw_text:
HEXAGRAM 45 GATHERING TOGETHER

The 45th gate is the only outlet for the entire tribal process, so this gate carries with it an enormous importance that is part of our evolutionary process. There will be a time, long away from now, when the
45 will actually become aware and will be part of what we now consider an ajna process. The 45 is very important. It is the only voice in the throat that is a purely possessive voice and therefore it is the only
place within the Throat in which the manifestation of possession takes place. To have and not have, to get and not get, to be able to control and not control: all this is rooted in the nature of the 45.

The 45 is a gate of action. It is directly connected to the ego and, in that sense, very different from the 35 and the 12 that are connected to the solar plex. It is not operating in the wave of the solar plex. It is
operating out of the energy of the ego which we call willpower or, when we are being negative, egoism.

The 45 is the gate of the tribal leader. This is not the collective leadership of the 31. This is the tribal leader, the leader by blood. This is the queen and the king. This is the lord and the lady. This is the
leading family in a community. This is all this kind of blood hierarchy.

Above the lines is says: The natural and generally beneficial attraction of like forces. The keyword here is 'beneficial.' This is the nature of the 45. The responsibility of the king and queen, regardless of whether
they are pashas or not, or possessive or not, regardless of whether they have to have the nicest crown and throne, their power lies in them being of benefit to the tribe. As long as they can be of benefit to the tribe,
they can indulge in anything, including decadence. As long as their benefit is there for the tribe, they are of value.

45.1 Canvassing

When you begin with the first line, you begin with the inherent recognition that to be a 45 is to be, by your very nature, beneficial to the tribe. That does not mean that you get to exercise that beneficence.
After all, if you do not have the other side, then you always have to wait for the energy to come.

The first line is called Canvassing which is: The ability to promote and develop gathering together through the education of the uncommitted. Mars in detriment. An over-zealousness that turns canvassing
into proselytization and tends to alienate rather than gather support. This is all about education.

In terms of the white book: The material direction lies in education, or The drive for material that leads to aggressive education.

The whole thing about being the leader of the tribe is that the way in which the tribe benefits is by being educated. The more educated the community, the more successful it becomes. We live in an age in which
we have watched this historically over the last 300 years: the development of public education and the vast improvement in the nature of our lives and the ability for us to have representative democracies in
which the population as a whole is given a responsibility for the direction of the people. This is the byproduct of education. The key to the nature of the 45 is that, if they can bring education to the tribe,
they are always going to be of benefit, which means they themselves have to be educated.

It is very important for 45's to be educated and, of course, this is a joke because all aristocracy has been privileged in having education while the rest of humanity was left behind. It is built into being a 45 that
you must have a solid education because it is only out of that grounding that you can be of benefit to those that are in your community.

At the mundane level, at the material level, this is about being successful in business when you can provide something new, something of educational value, something that the other does not know anything
about. For example, the first person that brings the refrigerator into the community that never had one before. When the tribal leader brings the refrigerator and says, "Let me educate you about the benefits of
this refrigerator. " You can be a salesman in a shop or you can be the tribal leader, but what you are trying to bring is of benefit.

This is one of the keys to the 45. If the 45 is not providing something that is of benefit to the community, whatever they make, whatever money they bring into their lives, will poison them. I am being very heavy
because it is accurate. This is the whole nature of possession. The 45 is allowed to possess. This is their nature. They have to possess. At the same time, out of their possession, they must bring benefit to others
and it must be of value to others. If they just make money from the tribe, "Here I have the ABC box and you should all have my picture hanging in your house," that is not a leader benefiting the public because
they have to buy that. They have to invest in that and, ultimately, the money that comes from that will be poisoned because it is not of benefit. The leader must bring things of benefit. The first line knows that its
beneficence is there, but it does not necessarily know how to bring that to the tribe.

45.2 Consensus

The second line is projection, so you know what these people are projecting out. They project out that they can be the tribal leader and that they can be of benefit to others. The fact that this is a mechanical
gate in the throat, a metamorphic gate, means that there are already built into these people techniques of bringing about this beneficial impact.

The second line is called Consensus. Gathering together is strengthened by acknowledged common interest. Well, it does not work any other way. These people are projecting out that they can be of benefit.
But they can only really be of benefit to those people that they can really be of benefit to. Otherwise, they are paper tigers and it may not turn out to be that way and they are uncomfortable.

Uranus exalted. The inventiveness to establish techniques by which common ground can be assessed. So, there is a quality within these people that they can project out, which is that they can provide a beneficial
technique to others.

In the white book: A material direction through the expression of techniques for the benefit of others.
Please, do not forget this beneficence. It always has to be built into this process. The difficulty with the second line is that, because they are projecting outwards, there are only certain people (this is not a
transpersonal line) that they can really be of benefit for. They feel handicapped by those people for which they are not of benefit.

They end up with the pressure of the other side, which is: An innate rebellion against conformityor, in terms of the white book: The refusal to accept the material techniques of others. That is like being the
king and saying, "This is the way things work." And, instead of having a subject that says, "This is not for me," you have a subject that comes up to you and says to you, "Your technique is wrong." The 45.2 in
detriment does not want to hear anything like that. They are not going to pay attention to somebody else telling them what and how the benefit should be. They are people that try to become the power behind the
throne, and they try to control. These 45.2's can often get controlled from behind by other people.

45.3 Exclusion

Most difficult in the 45 is the third line. So many third lines are difficult simply because they are involved in this trial and error process. Because the wave is about bonds made and broken, this is extremely

difficult for a tribal leader. The bond for a tribal leader is only broken when they die. This is something that is clear for them in the nature of their process. This is not an official that you can un-elect. This is a
tribal leader. You either kill them or you wait until they die, but they are going to be the leader until they die. This is the way we used to live with kings in this world.

This line is called Exclusion. It says: The ability when excluded to take whatever measures are necessary to dissolve the antiquated form and to accept even humiliation to achieve inclusion. These are people who
know that they are the ones that can bring the benefits but they do not always get that recognition.
Because so often in their growing process, they offer a benefit that they can bring, and there is a mistake involved and it does not really work out, due to that, they don't necessarily trust themselves. Nor do the
others who hook into that energy trust them that there really is something that can work. Yet at the same time, because it is in their blood, it is in their genetics to be a leader, they will do anything, including
accepting humiliation, to get close to that center of power, so that they can eventually have their opportunity to be beneficial to others. The instinct to find a way to be included in a material process.

The other side is: The expression of frustration when not included in a material process. This is as it says in the black book: An aggressive and often violent reaction to exclusion. For example: succession in a
family. You have five children and one of them becomes the ruler of the tribe. One of those children realizes within themselves that they are the one that can bring a better benefit to the tribe and that they
will be a better leader, but they have to accept the humiliation of not being the leader and still stay close to the leadership. On the positive side, they make their contribution that way. They will slowly try to
educate the one that is really in power to get the benefits out somehow so that they can participate in that process. But, if they have the detriment, then they hire an assassin and they kill their sibling and they take
over the throne. Or the producer who controls the film instead of the director. The director has to suffer the humiliation of putting up with the producer saying, "You have to do this and that." And slowly, the
director tries to find a way in which he can influence the producer, so that it comes out beneficially the way he wants. Of course, in the extreme, you kill the producer.

45.4 Direction

When you come to the upper trigram, you come to the fourth line. You come to externalization, to this fixed recognition that, first of all, there is another side. The 45/21 never works properly when it is inside
somebody's chart. If you see somebody who has this whole channel, you know that they will always have difficulties. This is a channel that is designed to be electro-magnetic, in order to be at its most effective.
The awareness in the fourth line is the recognition and the mechanic that there is a force on the other side, the 21, the power of the ego to drive this whole process. The fourth line is called Direction. This is a fixed
externalization of being of benefit. That is what it is all about.

The ability to focus the opportunity of gathering together for the service of higher principles. 'Higher principles' means: is it of benefit? That is all. Don't get caught up in thinking that is has to be spiritual or
mystical. It has to do with the mundane plane and being able to provide for the tribe. When it comes to the tribe, the highest principles are food, shelter and health. That is number one. After that, there are all
these different levels. Higher principles mean that, whatever the source of the material plane is, it has to bring benefit to those who will receive all of that.

On the other side, we have Mars in detriment. The tendency to try to influence the direction of a group action for personal benefit. That is okay. It is the same process. These people make sure that, while they
are being of benefit to everybody else, they are really of benefit to themselves as well. They are not just simply fixed on externalizing their beneficial value to others.

In the white book: The expression (or the lack of expression) of higher principles on the material plane. If you get involved in bringing false benefits to the community, this will always backlash against the 45,
even if it is the 21 who does it. It is the 45 that has to take the responsibility for that. So, it is very important for 45 's to recognize that whatever they are involved in on the material plane, they have to see
the direct benefit of their work. If they cannot see the direct benefit of their work, they are in the wrong kind of work because it is going to bring back all kinds of negative energy into their life. The other thing
is, like in all fourth lines, it waits for opportunity.

45.5 Leadership

You get to the fifth line and you get to universalization. Again, this is the way in which the community, the tribe, will project onto this fifth-line person. It is always projected onto them that they really are the
leader. These are people that naturally can be made leaders in a community because the community will project this quality onto them. Whether you are dealing with the exalted or the detriment in this line, there
is very little difference, other than that the detriment talks about the immature process. It is about what it takes to slowly develop that recognition because it is built in.

This line is called Leadership. All gathering must have a center and a focus. This is about the leader. They are the center, the focus. They are the one. Uranus exalted. The intuitive intellect and gift for innovation
that enhance the group effort and ensure continuity through respect for the center. They are projected on to be the tribal authority and, in the exalted side, they have the capacity to live that out.

The gift for expressing leadership on the material plane. By the way, the way a 45 expresses their leadership is always being able to educate others so that they can benefit, which means that they direct.
They tell people what to do; they don't do the doing themselves. That is why the 21 connected to the 45 in a chart is of no value whatsoever to the 45, because the 45 then says, "I have to do." This is not for them
to do. They have to educate and provide the benefit, but it is for the tribe to work out those benefits, to go through that process.

The Jupiter in detriment. A sense of right action that assumes a respect that may not as yet have been earned. This side is the difficulty for the child. This is the situation where the child itself recognizes its
leadership quality but, of course, leadership is something that you have to establish. You have to be able to show that you can do it. When you are young, you do not have that experience. So, the reality is that
these children seem very arrogant, very aristocratic. They can feel like, "I am a pasha and everything should come to me now," instead of waiting until the time comes that they can really earn that by truly
being of benefit to others. Again, they are the product of the projection field on them.

In the white book: The drive for leadership that may not have yet earned the right. What I say to these people is, "That is okay. You will eventually get the respect. You just keep on working on your process."
That is what it is all about.

45.6 Reconsideration

This 45.6 is very extraordinary because it goes directly to the 12.1. The 12th gate is the gate called
Standstill. Standstill is where mutation is spread. It is out of 12th gate, which is a mutative gate, that we first got our voice. It is the gate in which all mutation gets to manifest out into the world. The 45.6 is
looking directly at this individual mutative process and its social capacity to spread that mutation. The
45.6 is the kind of tribal leader that makes the tribe very nervous because it is the only tribal leader that recognizes that, unless we integrate the strangers, the outsiders, into the tribe, the genetic pool of the tribe
is going to die.

Imagine what that is like if it is a family business. The head of the family business says, "The only way that this business is really going to grow now is if we stop having it as a family business. We put our
shares on the stock market. We become a real corporation and we will bring in all these outsiders to help us in this process to expand." For members of the tribe, for members of that family, that can be very
frightening because it is no longer a family community business. All of a sudden, outsiders are coming in.

This sixth line, like all sixth lines, knows that it is not enough to be the tribal leader. "I don't want to be just this tribal leader. I don't want to sit in my tipi, in my village, living a primitive life for the rest of my
days. I want a television, a computer..." The reality is that the sixth line recognizes the intrinsic value of the outsider. On one side: Let's just bring the outsiders in. On the other side: Once we have them in, let's
control them so that the rest of the tribe is happy.

So, you have all kinds of rulers in history. (Catherine the Great, who brought all the French philosophers into the court.) They brought the outsiders in to try to bring about a broader mutation in the tribe, so that
the tribe would grow and become healthier, thus bringing a benefit from the outside. New genes, new blood, new ideas and new concepts. All of that is a threat to the tribe because the tribe likes its traditions.
It does not expect its leaders to be heretics, but the reality is that their leader can turn around on them and say, "Yes, but I want to bring in all these foreign people because I think that this will be beneficial to our
society."

We all know what happens afterwards. We have that in our all modern countries where you have all kinds of immigration and then you have the native tribe and you bring in all these other forces, and after a while
you get a backlash in all of that because the tribe gets upset.

A material direction which serves the outsider; or A material direction that is focused on conditioning the outsider to conform.

An outsider who can admit that its prior rejection was an error will generally be accepted into the gathering. To bring the outsiders in is the gift of the sixth line. An innate empathy with the outsider
mentality and its eccentric and often misunderstood logic. This works on many levels, but the real level is that if you don't bring the strangers in, the tribe is going to fail. It is going to die. If you do not bring a
stranger into the business, it is not going to be successful.

Jupiter in detriment. Where Uranus will innovate to find a place for an outsider, Jupiter will demand that it conforms. "Okay, you are a stranger. You have come here and you have fallen in love with my
daughter, and you do not come from the same tribe as me. I don't mind that you are here. You can be my son, but you have to behave like we behave here in this village. Bring your blood, but I am going to
control you and make sure that you look like everybody else in the tribe, so that nobody gets upset and bothers my poor daughter because she has married this freak, this outsider." This is the sixth line saying,
"Okay, you can come in as a stranger, but I will control you."

All of this is about understanding that, rooted in the 45.6, is the opportunity for the tribe to mutate. If the tribe cannot mutate, we will have no changes in this world that are really of value. It is only when the
tribe changes that the world changes. The collective is impersonal. The tribe is there in deep support for each other. Only when we can mutate the tribe are we going to have eventual mutation in the way that we
live with each other and the way we share the resources of the world.
